slogan.slogan: Horsey Gang is a collection of 6666 unique hand drawn NFTs living on the Solana Blockchain. This collection is the first one of the three phased Horsey Gang Family project. The next phases are Horseys Wives and 3D Baby Horseys as a playable avatars futured in the metaverse.

Horsey Gang Nfts are designed as a project that can be stored for a long time and will gain value with each passing time. Horsey owners involved in this project will have privileges for next phases that will be done in the future.

With Horseys you can have fun and earn at the same time! Horseys are ready for a dream run! As you move toward a dream the  dream  moves towards you! Be a member of our gang and run to your dreams with Horseys!

- Horsey Gang series is a project integrated with art. Our artists and experienced team, who have been drawing for many years, will provide 24/7 service to constantly update our collection and provide new entries to the collection.
- Our social media and communication accounts will continue to work for community by providing active feedback to you.
- Your Horsey and Horsey Wives series  will bring you new NFTs and will have both artistic and commercial returns. We have given detailed information on the road map.
- It is a collection that has taken its place in the market with the support of you, and our first goal is to win together.

containers.title: Roadmap
containers.subtitle: Home is Home!
containers.slogan: Our main goal is to buy a land in the Metaverse and and allocate this land to the deed owners of Cozy Homes via smart contracts and provide the market liberalisation. This will lead Cozy Home owners to have even more revenue from their investements than the investments in any other projects. Our future plans include brand development, rarity tools contribution, giveaways and other gifts for deed owners.

containers.title: Rarity
containers.slogan: Each Cozy Home design feature is assigned randomly to every artwork for you! All Cozy Home is a unique entity. Nevertheless, some of them which we scattered among, are even more unique than others! To buy more Cozy Home deeds means a higher chance for your successful investment!

containers.title: Attributes
containers.subtitle: Cozy Home designs consist of 7 different attributes. Each attribute has a different number of designed features with varying rarity scores. Hover on each attribute to see how many different features exist!

pictures.title: Launch
content: Mint of 1000 of 8888 unique Horseys on website for pre-sale

pictures.title: Creation of Phenomenal Horseys
content: Choosing three of the most active people on our Discord channel and the creation of their own Horsey NFT characters
The income of Phenomenal Horseys will be given to their owners!

pictures.title: Release of Horsey Wives
content: After the sold out , the launch of Horsey Wives
The holders of Horseys will be whitelisted for future sales.
Giveaway physical gifts worth of $2000 to the 5 Horsey holders who has both male and female Horseys.

pictures.title: Breeding
content: 3D Baby Horseys will be randomly minted from the website
Holders of both male & female collection will have their 3d Babys free!
The more Horsey family you hold the more baby you get!

pictures.title: Playable Metaverse Avatars
content: Horsey GANG is ready to be a family and take their place in Metaverse!
Once all objects are achieved, Horsey Gang will start a life in their universe, Horsecity!
In Horsecity, 3D Baby Horsey owners will create their own story by giving life to the characters to meet new people, play various games and make a new life in their metaverse

slogan.slogan: HOW CAN I MINT A HORSEY?
slogan.slogan2: You can mint Horseys on our website!

slogan.slogan: WHEN IS THE LAUNCH?
slogan.slogan2: The drop date will be announced soon (follow our social channels for exact times!)

slogan.slogan: HOW MUCH WILL IT COST?
WHAT SOLANA WALLETS CAN I USE?
slogan.slogan2: At launch we will be allowing purchases and management through two of Solanaâs main wallets; Phantom and Sollet.

slogan.slogan: IS THERE A LIMIT?
slogan.slogan2: We will be limiting people to 1 horsey per transaction. This means you can return to the mint section as many times as you want

slogan.slogan: DO YOU HAVE A RARITY SYSTEM?
slogan.slogan2: We will be limiting people to 1 horsey per transaction. This means you can return to the mint section as many times as you want

slogan.slogan: WILL THERE BE SECONDARY MARKET?
slogan.slogan2: We will be limiting people to 1 horsey per transaction. This means you can return to the mint section as many times as you want

slogan.slogan: WHAT UTILITY DOES HORSEY GANG OFFER?
slogan.slogan2: The first utility Horsey Gang provide holders is the chance of free airdrops, giveaways, gifts and incomes from sales. Also all Horsey family holders will get 3d NFT Baby Horses for free.

slogan.slogan: HOW CAN I CONTACT TO YOU?
slogan.slogan2: If you have any questions or concerns you can get in contact with us by joining our discord server and opening a support ticket.
